title: Assign License via License Group & Understand Profiles
summary: Add users to the appropriate license group; validate profile-driven action visibility.

steps.label: Open Profiles
steps.action: Open the relevant License Profile and view its information.

steps.label: Add users to the license group
steps.action: From the profile, follow the link to its license group → Edit Group → Add members.

steps.label: (Optional) Hide actions with a standard profile
steps.action: Create/assign a standard profile to hide actions not needed beyond license entitlement.

steps.label: Named vs Active Daily (awareness)
steps.action: Choose license group based on usage model (fixed named vs daily concurrent).
notes: Named user groups have fixed capacity; Active Daily locks a seat per day when a user signs in.
